meanings.definition: To convert (a photographic image) into a positive by exposure to light and then development.
meanings.sent1: She was solarising the old film negatives to see the pictures clearly.
meanings.sent2: The photographer spent hours solarising the images from the nature hike.
meanings.sent3: After solarising the photos, they looked as bright as a sunny day.
meanings.sent4: The process of solarising the film brought out hidden details in the pictures.
meanings.sent5: Solarising the images made them glow with newfound clarity.
